mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CI_CONTENT_LEVEL ( id, code, lastUpdateDate, lastUpdateOperatorId, name, valid, createDate, createOperatorId, modifyAble, remark, categoryCode ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{code}, #{lastUpdateDate}, #{lastUpdateOperatorId}, #{name}, #{valid}, #{createDate}, #{createOperatorId}, #{modifyAble}, #{remark}, #{category.code} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE CI_CONTENT_LEVEL
lastUpdateDate = #{lastUpdateDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
lastUpdateOperatorId = #{lastUpdateOperatorId,javaType=java.lang.String},
name = #{name,javaType=java.lang.String},
valid = #{valid,javaType=boolean},
modifyAble = #{modifyAble,javaType=boolean},
remark = #{remark,javaType=java.lang.String},
categoryCode = #{category.code,javaType=java.lang.String},
WHERE
AND id = #{id}
AND code = #{code}
